EmailTemplate.name: PivAcademy_Website_Contact Us.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your Inquiry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for contacting Pivotal. A member of our team will get in touch with you within 48 hours.
Please contact us <mailto:info@pivotal.io> if you have any questions.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
